section.title: Target Audience
section.para: This book is for TYPO3 extension developers who have basic knowledge in PHP programming and in working with and administering TYPO3. It gives a compact introduction into the Extbase framework and the Fluid template engine. We are striving for the following target audiences:

listitem.para: Beginners, who want to use Extbase and Fluid right from start as a basis for own extensions
Experienced developers, who want to learn Extbase and Fluid before a new project
Developers, who want to port their existing extensions early to FLOW3
Deciders, who want to gain a technical overview over the new framework.
